tool_description: Analyzes content characteristics to predict potential engagement levels and provides optimization suggestions.

content_text.description: The social media content text to analyze

platform.description: Target platform: instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, or tiktok

content_type.description: Type of content: text_only, image_with_text, video, carousel, story, or reel

hashtags.description: Hashtags to be used with the content

historical_performance.description: Account performance level: high, medium, low, or new_account

error_messages: Invalid platform: Use one of [instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok]
Invalid content type: Use one of [text_only, image_with_text, video, carousel, story, reel]
Invalid historical performance: Use one of [high, medium, low, new_account]
Invalid follower count: Must be between 0 and 10,000,000
Empty content text: Provide content to analyze
Too many hashtags: Maximum 30 hashtags allowed
usage: Submit content text, platform, content type, and hashtags for analysis. Optionally provide historical performance data and follower count. Returns engagement predictions and optimization recommendations.

confidence_level.description: Prediction confidence: high, medium, or low

optimization_suggestions.description: Specific recommendations to improve engagement potential
